attributes.action: Reverse the decision to pay benefits to multiple wives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: According to press reports on 4 Feb 08, Department for Work and Pensions has decided that if a man immigrates to the UK  with more than one wife, each wife is eligible for full UK benefits.  This is despite the fact that polygamous marriage is illegal in Britain!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
